reviewText: Awesome, especially for families! Highly recommend!
Well made short video's with great messages! These are great for church lessons, family nights - just to help you want to be a better person!

I  recommend this to anyone who is interested in view uplifting messages from and about good people.  It is a great video for teenagers also to help them see that they can find lasting peace and happiness thru Jesus Christ.  You will witness true Christians in action!
Convienent and easy to use, great videos. Much easier than downloading all of these. These videos are inspiring and motivating, and are great to watch as a family.
I shipped this to my child serving a mission. It's helped many people come Closer to Christ. Thank you very much.
this helped me a lot. it is a great teaching / learning book.  easy to understand, full of great resources!
These are great messages that work perfect for family home evenings! I recommend this for anyone that has a family and wants to have more uplifting things to watch.
Great for teaching Sunday School lessons.  I have used the short stories many times.  It is also great for  inspiration when needed.
